A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi as an original story was intriguing\, however as a sequel to The Force Awakens.  It was a step backwards.  Snoke by far has to be the most wasted villain in any franchise I have ever seen.  Certain characters do not get justice\, especially after waiting over a decade plus years to finally see them on screen.  I believe if you new to the franchise then The Last Jedi just might be for you but if are a fan of the original series episodes IV\, V\, and VI then you might feel that your child hood was shredded apart.  I give it 2.5 out of 5.
